mapper.select: select count(distinct le.`event_id`) from `logging_event` le left join `logging_event_property` as lep on (le.event_id = lep.event_id)
select substring_index(`logger_name`, '.', 4) as `module` from `logging_event` group by `module`;
select `caller_class` from `logging_event` where `caller_class` like 'org.complitex.flexbuh.%' group by `caller_class` order by `caller_class`
select `logger_name` from `logging_event` where `caller_class` like 'org.complitex.flexbuh.%' group by `logger_name` order by `logger_name`
select `mapped_value` from `logging_event_property` where `mapped_key` = 'MODEL_CLASS' and `mapped_value` is not null group by `mapped_value` order by `mapped_value`
